help: If you would like to know the commands I know, try /help
user: You can right click a users name, go to Apps, then Get RSI Profile to get the profile information for user from the RSI website
userorg: You can right click a users name, go to Apps, then Get RSI Org to get the users organization information from the RSI website
org: The /org command will give you information from the RSI website about that org.  You'll need to know the Org's SID
ship: Try the /ship command to get information about a particular type of ship
requisitions: Have you got spare weapons lying around? Reach out to a Requisitions officer to get paid for them!
